GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15.87 to before v5.15.91
GSD.description:
octeontx2-pf: Fix the use of GFP_KERNEL in atomic context on rt

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.91 by commit 29e9c67bf3271067735c188e95cf3631ecd64d58, it was introduced in version v5.15.87 by commit 6ea5273c71dd2d07c0a2459594eb34bc087939f7. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: octeontx2-pf: Fix the use of GFP_KERNEL in atomic context on rt
